message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $850,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $750,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $750,000 is simply too low. I'm willing to come down a bit, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for this valuable product.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $825,000. This is a significant discount from my initial offer, but it's the lowest I can go. Let me know if you're interested.

I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $775,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.
